tool_description: Introducing our cutting-edge API, your gateway to a diverse range of products spanning endless categories. Imagine the seamless shopping experience of Amazon, but better. With our curated list of products, you can easily search and display a plethora of options, making every interaction a delightful discovery.
name: Affogato The Ecommerce Store
title: Affogato The Ecommerce Store

api_list.name: Get items by category
api_list.description: Retrieves items belonging to a specific category.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://affogato-the-ecommerce-store.p.rapidapi.com/api/items/category/Men's Clothing"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "affogato-the-ecommerce-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://affogato-the-ecommerce-store.p.rapidapi.com/api/items/category/{category}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "affogato-the-ecommerce-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Reviews by Item ID
api_list.description: Retrieves the customer reviews for a specific item based on its ID.

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "affogato-the-ecommerce-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
